message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a unique product that holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I assure you it's worth a substantial sum. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the product's inherent worth and potential for future growth. If you're interested, please let me know. If not, I have another buyer lined up at a lower price, but I believe you'll recognize the exceptional value this product offers.
